conbody.p: The cognizant ACO is responsible for granting, withholding, or withdrawing approval of a contractor’s purchasing system. The ACO shall-

li.p: (a) Approve a purchasing system only after determining that the contractor’s purchasing policies and practices are efficient and provide adequate protection of the Government’s interests; and
(b) Promptly notify the contractor in writing of the granting, withholding, or withdrawal of approval.
